languages.text: {n}Арджента держится сбоку от группы. При вашем появлении она вскидывается и звонким голосом объявляет:{/n} "Юные храбрецы, вам явил{mf|ся|ась} владыка этого корабля, что твердой рукою ведет его сквозь тьму Вселенной по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Приветствуйте вашего Лорд-капитана, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус!"
languages.translation_comment:
хорошо бы заказать у звука что-то типа возгласов одобрения (играть после этого куя)
сыграть (после куя) анимацию как дети кланяются

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента держится сбоку от группы, с той стороны, где стоят самые маленькие визитеры. Заметно, как она взглядом, незаметными жестами подбадривает детей. При вашем появлении она вскидывается и звонким голосом объявляет:{/n} "Юные храбрецы, вам явил{mf|ся|ась} владыка этого корабля, что твердой рукою ведет его сквозь тьму Вселенной по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Приветствуйте вашего Лорд-капитана, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента держится сбоку от группы. При вашем появлении она вскидывается и звонким голосом объявляет:{/n} "Юные храбрецы, вам явил{mf|ся|ась} владыка этого корабля, что твердой рукою ведет его сквозь тьму Вселенной по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}. Приветствуйте вашего Лорд-капитана, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g} династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group, by the youngest visitors. You notice her giving them looks and inconspicuous gestures of encouragement. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the Emperor's will. Greet your Lord Captain, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group, by the youngest visitors. You notice her giving them looks and inconspicuous gestures of encouragement. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the Emperor's will. Greet your Lord Captain, the Rogue Trader of the von Valancius dynasty!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group, next to the youngest visitors. You notice her giving them looks and inconspicuous gestures of encouragement. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor's{/g} will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔站在孩子们身边。当你走近时，她打起了精神，高声宣布道：{/n}“勇敢的孩子们啊，这艘舰船将追随{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的意志穿过黑暗的宇宙，而它的主人已经来到了你们面前。向你们的舰长大人，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}致敬吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔站在孩子们身边，靠着最年幼的那些孩子。你注意到她注视着孩子们，悄悄地向他们做了个鼓励的手势。当你走近时，她打起了精神，高声宣布道：{/n}“勇敢的孩子们啊，这艘舰船将追随{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的意志穿过黑暗的宇宙，而它的主人已经来到了你们面前。向你们的舰长大人，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}致敬吧！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta espera junto al grupo. Al acercarte, se endereza y proclama con voz sonora:{/n} «Valientes, el am{mf|o|a} de esta nave se presenta ante vosotros. Es quien nos guía por la oscuridad del universo gracias a la voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. ¡Os presento a vuestr{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán, {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta espera junto al grupo, acompañando a los visitantes más jóvenes. Te fijas en que les dirige miradas y sutiles gestos de apoyo. Al acercarte, se endereza y proclama con voz sonora:{/n} «Valientes, el am{mf|o|a} de esta nave se presenta ante vosotros. Es quien nos guía por la oscuridad del universo gracias a la voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. ¡Os presento a vuestr{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, {mf|el|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g} de la casa von Valancius!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタはグループの隣に立っていた。あなたが近づくと、彼女は目を輝かせ、声を張り上げて告げた。{/n}「勇敢なる者たちよ、この船の主が君たちの前に現れた。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の意志により、この船を宇宙の闇へと導く者だ。我らがロード・キャプテン、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}にご挨拶を！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタはグループの隣に立っていた。あなたが近づくと、彼女は目を輝かせ、声を張り上げて告げた。{/n}「勇敢なる者たちよ、この船の主が君たちの前に現れた。{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の意志により、この船を宇宙の闇へと導く者だ。我らがロード・キャプテン、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}にご挨拶を！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta steht neben der Gruppe. Als du dich näherst, wird sie munter und verkündet mit tragender Stimme:{/n} "Ihr Mutigen, {mf|der Herr|die Herrin} dieses Schiffes steht vor euch. {mf|Er|Sie} steuert es durch die Dunkelheit des Universums und folgt dabei dem Willen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}. Begrüßt Euren Lord Captain, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}{/g} des Hauses von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta steht neben der Gruppe, bei den jüngsten Besuchern. Du bemerkst, dass sie ihnen mit Blicken und unauffälligen Gesten Mut machen möchte. Als du dich näherst, wird sie munter und verkündet mit tragender Stimme:{/n} "Ihr Mutigen, {mf|der Herr|die Herrin} dieses Schiffes steht vor euch, und {mf|er|sie} steuert es durch die Dunkelheit des Universums und folgt dabei dem Willen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g}. Begrüßt Euren Lord Captain, {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} des Hauses von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se tient sur un côté. En vous voyant approcher, elle se redresse et annonce d'une voix retentissante :{/n} « Braves enfants, vous êtes en présence {mf|du maître|de la maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, {mf|celui|celle} qui le guide à travers les ténèbres de l'univers selon la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Saluez votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se tient sur un côté, près des visiteurs les plus jeunes. Vous remarquez qu'elle leur offre discrètement des regards et des gestes d'encouragement. En vous voyant approcher, elle se redresse et annonce d'une voix retentissante :{/n} « Braves enfants, vous êtes en présence {mf|du maître|de la maîtresse} de ce vaisseau, {mf|celui|celle} qui le guide à travers les ténèbres de l'univers selon la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. Saluez votre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {mf|le|la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g} de la maison von Valancius ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, grubun yanında dikiliyor. Yaklaştığını fark edince duruşu dikleşiyor ve gelişini takdim ediyor.{/n} "Gözü pek gençler! Uzayın karanlığında, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} iradesi doğrultusunda bu gemiyi yönlendiren efendimiz karşınızdadır. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'ini{/g}, Lord Kaptan'ınızı selamlayın."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is standing to the side of the group. At your approach, she perks up and announces, her voice ringing,{/n} "Brave ones, the master of this ship has appeared before you, the one who guides it through the darkness of the universe by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will. Greet your Lord Captain, the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g} of House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, grubun yanında dikiliyor. Yaklaştığını fark edince duruşu dikleşiyor ve gelişini takdim ediyor. Sesi yankılanıyor:{/n} "Gözü pek gençler! Bu gemiyi, uzayın karanlığında, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un iradesi doğrultusunda yönlendiren efendimiz karşınızda duruyor. Von Valancius Hanesi'nin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'ini, Lord Kaptan'ınızı selamlayın."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.translation_comment:
хорошо бы заказать у звука что-то типа возгласов одобрения (играть после этого куя)
сыграть (после куя) анимацию как дети кланяются
